settleUpModal.failedPermission: Permission denied. Please check your account settings.

dashboard.title: Budget Dashboard
dashboard.budgetDisabledText: Enable budget tracking in setup to see your progress

dashboard.subtitle: Track your spending against monthly budgets
dashboard.noCategoriesMessage: Add categories to start tracking your budget

intro.title: Set Up Your Budget
intro.subtitle: Choose the setup that works best for you
intro.subtitleAfterPairing: Choose how you want to track your shared expenses
intro.skipMessage: You can always set up budgets later from Settings

chooseStyle.title: Choose Your Style
chooseStyle.subtitle: How would you like to set your budget?
chooseStyle.smartDescription: We'll suggest budgets based on your spending patterns
chooseStyle.fixedDescription: Set a total monthly amount, we'll divide it across categories
chooseStyle.fixedBest: Best if you know your limit

smart.title: All Set! Here's the plan:
smart.noteText: üí° Industry averages - We'll adjust based on YOUR spending
smart.navigationError: Failed to proceed. Please try again.

fixed.title: What's your monthly budget?
fixed.subtitle: We'll automatically distribute it across categories
fixed.validationError: Please enter a budget amount greater than zero.
fixed.navigationError: Failed to proceed. Please try again.

success.title: Budget Setup Complete!
success.subtitle: You're all set to start tracking expenses and managing your budget together
success.smartDescription: Industry averages, adjusts to your spending
success.budgetDataError: Budget data not set. This is likely a timing issue. Please go back and try again.
success.incomeError: Monthly income not set. Please go back and set a budget amount.
success.completionError: Failed to complete onboarding. Validation may have failed. Check console logs for details.

skip.title: Skip Budget Setup?
skip.subtitle: You can always set it up later from Settings
skip.message: Budget tracking helps you monitor spending and stay on track. You can set it up anytime.
skip.successMessage: Start tracking expenses with your partner
skip.infoText: You can enable budgets anytime from Settings

timeframe.title: Budget Timeframe
timeframe.subtitle: Choose how you want to plan your budget
timeframe.annualDescription: Plan for the full year, see monthly breakdown
timeframe.monthlyDescription: Simple monthly budgeting, one month at a time

strategy.title: How do you plan?
strategy.subtitle: Choose your budgeting strategy for the year
strategy.equalDescription: Same amount every month, simple & predictable
strategy.seasonalDetail: Great for expenses that change with seasons
strategy.customDescription: Set each month individually, maximum control
strategy.customDetail: Full flexibility for unique planning needs
strategy.infoText: Don't worry, you can change this later in settings

categories.title: Pick your categories
categories.subtitle: Choose what you want to track and budget for

allocation.validationError: Please allocate the full budget before continuing

savings.title: What happens to savings?
savings.subtitle: Decide how to handle money saved under budget
savings.mainDescription: Include budget savings in monthly settlement
savings.explanationText: When you spend less than your budget, the savings are split equally between both partners in the settlement calculation.
savings.secondaryDescription: This option lets you track budget vs. spending without including savings in settlements. Good for couples who handle leftover money differently.
savings.infoText: You can change this setting anytime in budget preferences

success.title: Your Budget is Ready!
success.subtitle: You're all set to start tracking and managing your shared finances
